com.chapman.operationsaferide

Class EmergencyPanic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chapman.operationsaferide.EmergencyPanic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EmergencySystem

    public class EmergencyPanic
extends java.lang.Object
implements EmergencySystem
    This class implements methods that intake a user phone number, and a message that will be sent to the public safety office. It also contains messages to send the message, and contains error handling if something goes wrong.
